MultiFeature.Name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
MultiFeature.Text: When you hit a creature with your eldritch blast, you can cast fireball as a bonus action using a warlock spell slot. The spell must be centered on the creature you hit with eldritch blast.
MultiFeature.Prerequisite: 5th level, the Fiend patron, eldritch blast cantrip
